general_advisory: The mean maximum daily temperature was 24.0°C and the mean minimum daily temperature was 17.3°C of the Gajapati district during the last week. The district received 65.1 mm of rainfall during the last week. Due to low night temperature and fog condition, there will be chance of infestation of sucking pests, leaf blight, powdery mildew in the Rabi crops and vegetables...

advisory: Soon after noticing the infestation of the stored grain insect pest, take up fumigation...
Sunflower crop is at 25-30 days stage. Go for hoeing and weeding and thinning and apply N -fertilizer.
There are chances of Aphid infestation in early sown mustard crop...
Farmers are advised to go for picking cotton on sunny days after 9 AM or when dew dries up from the crop surface...
To control aphids and thrips in chilli during primary stage of pest infestation...
To control aphids and thrips in chilli during primary stage of pest infestation...
To control fruit borer in Tomato, first collect and destroy the af fected fruits and grown up larvae...
Early planted potato crop is at 3 week stage. Go for hoeing and weeding and apply the rest 30-45 Kg N/acre...
Provide proper shelter to the animals with proper ventilation facilities...
Goa TPPR disease also known as 'Goat Plague'  is common during winter...
During winters, there is a possibility of 'EUS' disease in fish...
In winter number of feeders should be increased. Feed should be available to the bird whole of the day ...
